Iodine supplements
There is growing concern 
that some women of child 
bearing age and women who 
are pregnant in the UK may 
not be getting the required 
0.25mg of iodine from their 
diet. Pregnant women and 
breastfeeding mums who 
avoid dairy products, eggs 
and	or	fish	are	at	highest	risk	
of	iodine	deficiency.
Iodine is essential for brain 
development in the fetus 
and young child. Adults who 
eat a healthy balanced diet 
that	contains	eggs
